name: MKNWorkDays
summary: Allows querying for workdays and weekends based on user's locale
description:
Did you ever need to get all work days, but NSCalendar's firstWeekday
		   returned something that didn't make sense?
	           Based on Wikipedia http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Workweek_and_weekend, MKNWorkDays
		   contains the business days and weekend for 104 countries.
